mapper.insert: insert into flightorder (aid, tid, routeId, flightId, payStatus, orderPrice, beat, payTime) values (#{aid},#{tid},#{routeId},#{flightId},#{payStatus},#{orderPrice},#{beat},#{payTime})
mapper.update: update agency_order set handlerTime = #{handlerTime}, orderStatus = 1 where aid = #{aid} and tid = #{tid} and routeId = #{routeId}
